snippet: The Renaissance scholars and married couple Stephen Greenblatt and Ramie Targoff are trying to renew the reputation of Thomas Browne, a 17th-century physician.
abstract: Renaissance scholars Stephen Greenblatt and Ramie Targoff, in an effort to revive the once-celebrated reputation of 17th-century physician and writer Thomas Browne, are republishing his landmark works Urne-Buriall and Religio Medici.
lead_paragraph: The Renaissance scholars and married couple Stephen Greenblatt and Ramie Targoff are trying to renew the reputation of Thomas Browne, a 17th-century physician.

headline.seo: Thomas Browne, 17th-Century Author, Draws New Interest
headline.main: Reviving Thomas Browne, an Expert on Oblivion
headline.print_headline: Reviving Thomas Browne, an Expert on Oblivion
